    P

    PicnicScanner1D - Class in Unnamed Package
    The PicnicScanner1D class provides methods to allocate items into slots, create and modify items lists, and validate schedules based on V-shape distribution.

    S

    slotsSchedule(int, int, List<Integer>) - Method in class PicnicScanner1D
